text: The Wretches Are Still Singing () is a 1979 Greek independent drama movie directed by Nikos Nikolaidis. It is the first part of the trilogy of "Years of Cholera" series. It stars Alkis Panagiotidis, Konstantinos Tzoumas, Rita Bensousan, Christos Valavanidis, Dora Kalogridi and Maritina Passari. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 drama movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies directed by Nikos Nikolaidis Category:Movies set in psychiatric hospitals Category:Movies set in Greece
title: The Wretches Are Still Singing
